question: How do I get a Referral Code?
answer: Referral codes are instantly given to you after you complete your registration.

question: Do I get rewarded in tokens or ETH when I refer buyers?
answer: You receive your rewards in ETH instantly once someone your refer makes a transaction!

question: Where can I find my Referral Code?
answer: Upon signing up, you can find your referral code on your account settings.
